long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Recording Twitch Live stream locally or upload to cloud.

This extension allows users to automatically download and record of a Twitch live streaming within the browser.

=================
Features
1. Record live Twitch streaming
2. Auto colloect rewards
3. Live short streaming editing
4. Live streaming screenshot
5. Support storing to youtube google-drive
6. Support storing locally
7. Auto detect start of streaming
